Posts.Content: Do all these drugs make women nauseous? That's one of my concerns since I'll be finished with radiation on Monday and soon will be taking Arimidex or something else. I also have acid reflux and IBS and more nausea is not what I need! Very worried about that. I really don't want to take that particular drug since I already have osteoporosis. Jeez
Posts.Title: Stage 1 breast cancer 1 2
